column2: Fix: createDirectories doesn't handle symbolic links

column3:
Let's handle it to support symbolic links in configuration
See https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-164639
I will take a look Monday. Thanks for contribution.
Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
Just a friendly inquiry, are we still merging this PR?
NOTE: still seeing this in 2017.2 - for example when changing the runtime applicable to PHP for the project. Some settings can be saved however.
bump - I'm getting errors due to symlinks which break saving settings...
Fixed in 2017.3 Fix in our common path.kt, because there are other places where default Java NIO implementation is not suitable.
[fix] storageUtil: getOrCreateVirtualFile doesn't handle symbolic links
